expo.name: Quisipp Partner

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to show nearby delivery requests.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location for tracking deliveries.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to take photos of deliveries.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to upload delivery proof.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationUsageDescription: This app needs to send you notifications about new delivery requests.

expo.description: Quisipp Delivery Partner : Register as a delivery partner and start earning money by delivering packages and food

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your location for tracking deliveries.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera to take photos of deliveries.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your photos for delivery proof.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to save delivery photos to your library.
